column1: Dodinas was the fourth child of [[Gorbadoc Brandybuck]] and [[Mirabella Took]], born between {{SR
column3: 1313}}. He seems to have died before {{SR
column4: 1401}} as he was not present at [[Bilbo Baggins

column1: Like most male Brandybuck names, ''Dodinas'' is a Celtic name of unknown meaning. The name was also borne by Sir Dodinas le Savage, a Knight of the Round Table.
